name: WizapplyUI
short_description:
Although the 21st century had changed a lot by digital. However, we think that a design is insufficient for present digital. Software is also asked for a design. So to, speak, a system like a game thinks that the world will next be changed. Therefore, in Wizapply UI, the program which can develop next-generation UI for incorporating entertainment in various electronic devices in a world is offered.

We will realize smart society which is in a Sci-Fi film, and a smart pleasant world.

A concept is still in under plan.
summary: User interface design for next generation systems
